helpdesk_ticket.description:
PharmEasy Team,

This has been one of the most disappointing and unprofessional experiences
I have ever had with a diagnostic service.

I was clearly informed that my test results would be delivered by evening
or within 24 hours.

After waiting the entire day, your team has now contacted me to make a new
sale and when asked about my results for the previous test, they say it
will take 36 hours, and is additionally asking me to undergo more tests.
This is completely unacceptable.

Your staff was extremely prompt when it came to selling additional tests
and pushing add ons, yet suddenly becomes “not the right person” the moment
a refund is requested. I was even told to call another number for something
as basic as returning the money I paid in cash from someone trying to make
a sale?

To add to this, the conduct of the staff member on duty at 12 PM on 8th
December 2025 (Ms. Poonam as she says) was dismissive and unhelpful, making
an already frustrating situation worse.

Because of your delay and unreliability, my scheduled doctor’s appointment
at 2 PM which required the results has been wasted. I fly out tonight,
which means I now leave without receiving the medical care I specifically
came for.

As a healthcare provider, your first priority should be timely and reliable
service. Instead, your negligence has cost me both time and health.

I am requesting an immediate full refund in cash, exactly as paid.

Please confirm when It will be dropped?

Attached below are our tests and my ticket that you were well aware of.

Additionally, I would like to know, Is PharmEasy prepared to compensate for
the treatment I will now be forced to undergo abroad due to your delay in
lab results?

I expect a prompt response and resolution today.

Regards,

Khyati

--

Dear Shruti,

I do not accept your offer of ₹500.

My bill amounts to over ₹3,000, and your delay has already caused me
additional financial loss, including a wasted doctor appointment and
consultation fees, repeating the testing at another lab, and the need to
purchase medication outside India at a much higher cost. Offering ₹500 is
unreasonable and does not even begin to cover the damage caused.

As stated earlier, if my full refund is not processed immediately, I will
escalate this matter to the NABL and CDSCO, the authorities responsible for
medical testing standards in India, and proceed with legal action without
further notice.

I expect the full refund to be issued promptly.

Hence any communication should now be through this email.
Your repeated requests for information I have already provided are causing unnecessary delays, on top of the inconvenience created by your delayed test results.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Khyati Shah <shah.khyati06@gmail.com>
Date: Mon, Dec 8, 2025 at 1:08 PM
Subject: Urgent Complaint & Immediate Refund Request
To: <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in>


PharmEasy Team,
This has been one of the most disappointing and unprofessional experiences I have ever had with a diagnostic service.
I was clearly informed that my test results would be delivered by evening or within 24 hours. 
After waiting the entire day, your team has now contacted me to make a new sale and when asked about my results for the previous test, they say it will take 36 hours, and is additionally asking me to undergo more tests. This is completely unacceptable.
Your staff was extremely prompt when it came to selling additional tests and pushing add ons, yet suddenly becomes “not the right person” the moment a refund is requested. I was even told to call another number for something as basic as returning the money I paid in cash from someone trying to make a sale? 
To add to this, the conduct of the staff member on duty at 12 PM on 8th December 2025 (Ms. Poonam as she says) was dismissive and unhelpful, making an already frustrating situation worse.
Because of your delay and unreliability, my scheduled doctor’s appointment at 2 PM which required the results has been wasted. I fly out tonight, which means I now leave without receiving the medical care I specifically came for. 
As a healthcare provider, your first priority should be timely and reliable service. Instead, your negligence has cost me both time and health.
I am requesting an immediate full refund in cash, exactly as paid.
Please confirm when It will be dropped?
Attached below are our tests and my ticket that you were well aware of.
Additionally, I would like to know, Is PharmEasy prepared to compensate for the treatment I will now be forced to undergo abroad due to your delay in lab results?
I expect a prompt response and resolution today.
Regards,
Khyati

notes.body:
I would like to clarify once again that I do NOT agree to a refund to the
PharmEasy wallet. This was never discussed or approved by me. I am no
longer in India and will not be able to use the app or the wallet balance,
so this option is not acceptable.

Please process the refund in one of the two acceptable methods:


   1.

   Cash refund at the address where the blood sample was collected, OR
   2.

   Refund via phone number, for which I can provide the details once you
   confirm.


Kindly let me know which option you will follow so I can share the
necessary information.

If this continues to be delayed or mishandled, I will be left with no
option but to escalate the matter further with reference to this email
thread.

I expect your prompt cooperation.

Regards,

Khyati
